belongs_to_collection.name: Assault of the Party Nerds Collection

original_title: Assault of the Party Nerds 2: The Heavy Petting Detective
overview: Five years after throwing a killer party and stealing Muffin away from alpha-male Zeta frat member Bud, head party nerd Ritchie is married (to Muffin!) and runs a detective agency.
title: Assault of the Party Nerds 2: The Heavy Petting Detective
